displayName.text: City Cruises New York Pier 61 South

formattedAddress: Chelsea Piers Pier 61, New York, NY 10011, USA

authorAttributions.displayName: City Cruises New York Pier 61 South

adrFormatAddress: Chelsea Piers Pier 61, New York, NY 10011, USA

editorialSummary.text: Glass-roofed boats set sail around New York Harbor for lunch/brunch/dinner cruises & dancing.

originalText.text: This is definitely more on the pricey side of dinner cruises but is worth it. My wife and I celebrated our 2 year anniversary and got the romance package for two. I think because we got a package, we had a concierge staff take care of us personally. We took the glass boat cruise around downtown Manhattan, both Hudson and East Side River. They take you around the Statue of Liberty for great views. The music is lovely and fits very well with the cruise. I would definitely recommend it.

text.text: This is definitely more on the pricey side of dinner cruises but is worth it. My wife and I celebrated our 2 year anniversary and got the romance package for two. originalText.text:
To say this cruise was worth every penny is an understatement.
You can board a boat and experience a cruise with a view almost anywhere, but what made this trip worthwhile was their STAFF! I will cherish these memories for the rest of my life. EVERYONE here went above and beyond, making our experience a core memory for my husband and I. Bryan, our server, is so cheerful, happy, vibrant and kind. He‚Äôs helpful with food selections, attentive, and overall a heartwarming server who made our anniversary so memorable.
Mike helped answer every question my husband had about the city. What a knowledgeable, charismatic guy!!
And as for SWAN! What a gentleman. SO charitable!!! From greeting us at the door, to checking in on our dinner, to his overall unreasonable hospitality, this experience deserves beyond the stars we can give it!
Nelsy came by to wish us a happy anniversary, Jamal was willing to accommodate himself to taking our photo, Robin (the cruise photographer) takes PHENOMENAL photos that are worth the SHOT! üòâ we came to see the ball drop for our anniversary, but this was, without a doubt, the highlight of our trip to NYC. Bateaux New York felt like a something out of a movie. Truly, thank you all so much for such a magical night. You made us feel like we were the only ones on that boat. Until next time!üíï

originalText.text:
We used them to book our visit to the Statue of Liberty and Ellis Island. The process was easy and our ticket, though timed, allowed us to go at an earlier time.üëç.

Security was thorough. easy and quick. Boarding was surprisingly quick given the amount of people. I‚Äôm not sure of the time schedules but all three times we queued we were able to board on the docked boat. The ride was very smooth and the views from the deck, though crowded, were great!

All of the photos and video were shot onboard.

originalText.text:
We went on the Bateaux last night for our anniversary & we were treated like royalty. The staff is absolutely amazing! Such friendly people. And the cruise ship is gorgeous. The cruise route was breathtaking. We saw the beautiful NYC skyline all lit up, went under the Brooklyn Bridge & got extremely close to the Statue of Liberty.  I would definitely recommend going on this particular cruise ship. You will be glad you did.
And if any of the staff ever reads this‚Ä¶..THANK YOU SO VERY MUCH FOR A TRULY MAGICAL EVENING!!

originalText.text: I would have given this five stars if it were not for one thing. The vocalist in the live entertainments mic volume was turned up so loud I felt like I was being screamed at the entire cruise. The food and wine selection was very good as was the service.  The boat captain stopped in front of the Statue of Liberty for five minutes for us to take in the grandeur of the moment . This was an exceptional bucket list part of our tour of NYC  on November 25, 2023.
